example.code: $json = Get-LMPolicy -FunctionName "MylambdaFunction123"| Select-Object -ExpandProperty Policy | ConvertFrom-Json $json | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Statement Remove-LMPermission -FunctionName "MylambdaFunction123" -StatementId $json.Statement[0].Sid
example.description: This example removes the function policy for the specified StatementId of a Lambda Function.
